text: Senator Allen Ellender, of Louisiana, sparked off the opposition by telling a television tions. The Senate Banking Committee, which is headed by another Southern Senator Willis Robertson, of Virginia - met today in closed session to discuss Weaver's appointment. Senator Robertson later disclosed he had sent a letter to Mr. Kennedy saying he had received several complaints about Weaver's loyalty.
